remarks:
Closure law for addition in the real subfield of complex numbers.  Axiom 6 of 23 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axaddrcl . Proofs should normally use ~ readdcl instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) 

---

 Closure law for addition in the real subfield of complex numbers.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axaddrcl .  Proofs should normally use ~ readdcl instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
statement: ax-addrcl $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A + B ) e. RR ) $.
